sources.title: The Haunted Castle (1921)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. One of the earliest surviving films by acclaimed director F.W. Murnau, The Haunted Castle is a much more basic film that what he would later create. Still, this mystery motion picture has atmosphere and beautiful sets. The name definitely feels like a misnomer, as it is not a horror film, but instead a mystery.

metadata.Plot: In the castle Vogeloed, a few aristocrats are awaiting baroness Safferstätt. But first count Oetsch invites himself.. Everyone thinks he murdered his brother, baroness Safferstat's first husband, three years ago. So he is rather undesirable. But Oetsch stays; arguing he is not the murderer and will find the real one...
metadata.Actors: Arnold Korff, Lulu Kyser-Korff, Lothar Mehnert
